page.title: 15Ainsdale Village Green
page.content:
It was discovered in 2009 that The Green was not officially regestered as such on the DEFRA Register. After two years of researching, the Ainsdale Civic Society finally got the agreement of Sefton Council to register The Green to ensure that it will remain as a place of recreation for all residents in perpetuity
Ainsdale Civic Society
